title: Entertainment Live: Taylor Swift unhappy with Kanye West - BBC News
summary: independent newspaper to close in march .
greg james in final push for sport relief .
disappointing reviews for matthew perry play .

documents.title: goodbye !
text: so that 's all for today - but just before we go , a massive congratulations to radio1 dj greg james who has completed his sport relief challenge of completing five triathlons in five days .
good work sir , time for a well earned rest we think .
now , we will be back here on sunday evening , with a bafta live page special - bringing you all the news from the red carpet , the star-studded ceremony and behind the scenes in the press room .
be the first to find out the winners - and what happens next .
hope you can join us !

documents.title: simon callow in search of his inner clown
text: on friday 's the one show , actor simon callow - whose grandparents worked in the circus - channels his inner clown and goes in search of the fascinating story of the greatest clown of them all , 19th century slapstick sensation joseph grimaldi .

documents.title: kanye west defends taylor swift lyrics
text: kanye west has defended lyrics about taylor swift in his new song famous .
if you missed our earlier post , the controversial lyrics are : `` i feel like me and taylor might still have sex/ why ?
i made that b famous . ''
swift 's team said , in a statement , that she had `` cautioned him about releasing a song with such a strong misogynistic message '' .
kanye has since sent a series of tweets about the matter .
in them , he says he did actually get taylor 's blessing :
he then says that the word he used to describe swift `` is an endearing term in hip hop '' .
and he added that swift apparently inspired the lyrics , after telling one of kanye 's friends : `` i ca n't be mad at kanye because he made me famous . ''
finally , he concluded :

documents.title: gwen stefani releases new single
text: gwen stefani 's released another track from her forthcoming album .
make me like you , the second single from this is what truth looks like , is a bouncy pop tune and much more upbeat than her first track , used to love you .
there 's been speculation it 's about her new boyfriend , blake shelton .
she 's going to be recording the music video live from the grammys on monday - the first time that 's ever been done .

documents.title: tom hardy is 'most attractive leading man '
text: well , tom hardy certainly has something to smile about - he 's been voted the most attractive british leading man in the world of film and tv .
the star of the revenant and mad max : fury road topped the poll of 2,000 women , for digital channel drama .
colin firth was second , with orlando bloom coming in third .
daniel craig and idris elba complete the top five .

documents.title: rita ora wants x factor and the voice to 'keep fighting ' over her
text: rita ora says the x factor and the voice are `` fighting '' over her - and that she likes it .
she was first a coach on the voice , on bbc1 , before switching sides and joining the x factor for last year 's series .
ora told the sun : `` i hope they keep fighting over me , i do n't mind that at all .
i do n't know what is going on , but i like it . ''
she 's not made her mind up yet , adding : `` i have n't made a decision .
because i 've been focusing on recording my new album , i have n't started discussions over anything . ''
read more .
author: The Sun

documents.title: springsteen to release autobiography
text: bruce springsteen will release his autobiography later this year .
the singer has spent seven years writing born to run , which he has promised will `` show the reader his mind '' , charting his personal struggles and how they inspired his award-winning career .
publisher simon & schuster called him `` a captivating storyteller with a unique way of expressing himself '' .

documents.title: clooneys meet merkel in germany
text: we told you before how george and amal clooney were going to be meeting german chancellor angela merkel in germany .
well , here 's a from that private meeting , in which they discussed the war in syria and the migration crisis .
they were accompanied by former uk foreign secretary david miliband , head of the international rescue committee .

documents.title: rolf harris indecent assault charges
text: rolf harris is to be charged with seven counts of indecent assault , the crown prosecution service has said .
the cps said it had `` carefully considered '' evidence gathered and had authorised police to charge the 85-year-old former entertainer .
the alleged offences date from 1971 to 2004 and relate to seven complainants aged between 12 and 27 at the time of the alleged incidents , the cps added .
mr harris is currently serving a prison sentence for sex-related offences .
he will appear at westminster magistrates ' court on 17 march .
read more .

documents.title: spielberg 'surprised ' at oscar nomination omissions
text: steven spielberg has spoken about the oscars race row .
the director , nominated this year for bridge of spies , was `` surprised '' at some of the omissions from the nominations list .
spielberg singled out idris elba 's performance in beasts of no nation and nwa film straight outta compton as being worthy of recognition .
but he 's not totally behind the way the academy has handled the controversy .
he said :
i do n't believe that there is inherent or dormant racism because of the amount of white academy members .

i 'm also not 100 percent sure that taking votes away from academy members who have paid their dues and maybe are retired now and have done great service - maybe they 've not won a nomination , which would have given them immunity to the new rules , but they have served proudly and this is their industry , too - to strip their votes ?
i 'm not 100 percent behind that .
read more .
author: The Hollywood Reporter

documents.title: play inspired by victims of undercover policemen opens in nottingham
text: any means necessary - now running at the nottingham playhouse , was inspired by the real-life accounts of female victims of undercover policemen who forged real relationships in order to put them under surveillance .
speaking to bbc radio 4 's the world tonight , 'lisa ' the former partner of undercover officer mark kennedy said :
all the time i thought he was at home with me , that was him at work .
listen to a clip from the interview below .

documents.title: first music video shot in zero gravity
text: the first music video to be shot in zero gravity has been released by ok go - and has already been watched about 23 million times .
the chicago band filmed the promo for the song , featuring the line `` gravity 's just a habit '' , during eight flights over russia .
amazingly , it was filmed in a single take , the band said on their website .
ok go took a total of 21 `` parabolic '' flights , including training , and the band said the crew became a bit ill , shall we say .
or as they describe it , `` there were 58 puke events '' .
you can watch it on facebook .

documents.title: lady gaga and nile rodgers rehearsing bowie tribute
text: rodgers has tweeted saying he and lady gaga had a `` great day '' rehearsing their david bowie tribute for next week 's grammys ceremony .
grammy producer ken ehrlich has said the tribute will last approximately seven minutes and cover `` at least three or four '' bowie tunes .
he told the new york times is would be `` a true homage to who david was , particularly musically , but not ignoring his influence on fashion and pop culture in a broader way '' .

documents.title: strictly ballroom musical to premiere in leeds
text: strictly ballroom the musical will have its uk debut at the west yorkshire playhouse later this year .
the stage adaptation of baz luhrmann 's 1992 cult film will premiere in leeds on 30 november 2016 .
it will be directed and choreographed by drew mconie .
the film - originally based on a drama school play - told the story of a championship dancer who defies the rule book .
it is credited with inspiring the tv show strictly come dancing .
luhrmann premiered the original musical production in sydney in 2014 .
strictly ballroom has been an almost 30-year journey for me .

i have often marveled at how this story , born so long ago , has been in my life for so many years and has managed to touch , move , entertain and uplift so many different people from so many different backgrounds .
i think the simple truth is that , despite all the sequins , outrageous hairdos and classic hollywood musical plotting , the simple message that 'there is n't only one way to cha cha cha ' .

documents.title: sacha baron cohen film clip 'too graphic ' for tv
text: sacha baron cohen has a new film out - and apparently it 's too graphic to be shown on tv .
he went on us show jimmy kimmel live to promote the brothers grimsby , which is just known as grimsby in the uk .
in it , baron cohen plays football hooligan nobby who finds out his brother ( played by mark strong ) is a spy .
kimmel told the audience that a clip from the film was `` unacceptable for broadcast television '' , as it was `` very graphic '' .
so instead , just a few seconds were shown before the camera cut to the studio audience watching the clip , to show their reaction instead .
some had to cover their faces as the action unfolded on the screen , with shocked laughter and screams leaving tv viewers only guessing as to what was actually being shown .
the official trailer for the film can be found online , but be warned - this is a baron cohen-scripted film , so some people may find it offensive

documents.title: independent owner says `` the future is digital ''
text: independent owner evgeny lebedev said : `` the newspaper industry is changing , and that change is being driven by readers .
`` they 're showing us that the future is digital .
this decision preserves the independent brand and allows us to continue to invest in the high quality editorial content that is attracting more and more readers to our online platforms . ''
there will be 25 new digital content roles created , said esi media .

its chief executive steve auckland said : `` following this decisive move to digital , we will be as focused and uncompromised as any start-up , but with all the authority and trust of an established newsbrand - a truly unique proposition . ''
the i newspaper is being sold to johnston press .

documents.title: print edition of the independent to close
text: the independent and independent on sunday newspapers are to close .
the last print editions will come next month - but there will still be an online version .
an independent reporter tweeted the news :
there will be `` some redundancies among editorial employees '' , said parent company esi media .
the independent newspaper is closing - last edition will be on 26th march and last independent on sunday on 20 march .
website will continue .

documents.title: glenda jackson to star as king lear
text: glenda jackson is returning to the theatre to play king lear .
her role in the shakespearean tragedy is her first stage role in more than 25 years .
the former mp says she 's excited to be performing in such a challenging play .
she starred in a bbc radio 4 adaptation of emile zola 's les rougon-macquart last year , after leaving the world of politics .
asked if jackson would play lear as a man or a woman , director deborah warner said :
i think she 's playing lear , full stop .
he , or she , who takes the words into their mouth of any shakespearian character , becomes the character .
boom .
done .
the play will open at the old vic in october , with rehearsals starting in late august .
read more .
author: The Daily Mail

documents.title: greg james in final push for sport relief
text: greg james is on the final day of his triathlon challenge , and he has already raised £ 513,308 for sport relief , including `` over £ 100,000 just this morning '' .
greg was left speechless by the news of his total so far , saying : `` i really am in shock . ''
the bbc dj has already completed this morning 's swim , but still has a 46-mile bike ride around norwich and 10-mile run to complete .
coldplay and james corden are among those who have tweeted their support of his `` gregathlon '' .
best of luck , greg !

documents.title: tilda swinton speaks out about silent role
text: tilda swinton has been talking about her new film - in which she does n't speak .
when accepting the role of marianne lane in a bigger splash , swinton specified that her rock star character should be silent .
it was a time in my life when , for personal reasons , i was all out of words ; i did n't want to say anything .
i wanted to do the film though , and this was the only way i could make it happen .
director luca guadagnino got around the issue by saying that marianne is being forced to rest her vocal chords so she does n't lose her voice completely .
ralph fiennes and dakota johnson co-star in the film , which is released today .
read more .

documents.title: george and amal clooney on the red carpet
text: george clooney and tilda swinton were among the stars of the forthcoming coen brothers ' comedy hail , caesar !
to walk the red carpet for the opening night of the berlin film festival on thursday night .
they were joined by meryl streep who , as head of this year 's jury , will be instrumental in choosing the winner of the prestigious golden bear .
clooney is understood to be meeting german chancellor angela merkel today to discuss the refugee crisis .

documents.title: disappointing reviews for matthew perry 's first play
text: he may have been longing for good reviews , but it appears the critics have n't been exactly friendly to matthew perry today .
his debut play the end of longing - which he wrote and stars in - has just opened at the playhouse theatre in london .
the guardian says `` what works in half-hour bites on television looks decidedly thin on the stage '' and that it feels like `` an extended sitcom '' .
according to dominic cavendish in the telegraph , the play is `` a curious waste of time , money and effort '' .
the stage says it 's `` superficial '' , with `` the emotions phoney and barely earned '' .
and the independent is equally scathing , describing the friends star 's play as an `` ego trip '' .
holly williams writes : `` perry is a big box-office draw , but the end of longing will leave all except the most devoted friends fans longing for the end . ''
but there 's some good news for perry .

the times gives it four stars , with ann treneman saying it is `` funny '' and `` often laugh out loud '' , noting that perry `` looks like a man with something to prove to himself and us - and he has certainly done that '' .

documents.title: david walliams to host empire awards
text: children 's author and comedian david walliams will host this year 's jameson empire awards on 20 march .
the annual awards , founded by empire magazine in 1996 , are decided by readers of the film magazine .
this year sees the introduction of 11 new categories .
walliams - who is presenting the awards for the first time - said he was `` super excited to find out which hollywood stars are attending this year '' .
the final nominations for the awards will be announced on 18 february .
`` with such a brilliant host and more gongs up for grabs than ever before , it 's sure to be a night to remember , '' said empire 's editor-in-chief , terri white .

documents.title: new spat between taylor swift and kanye west
text: taylor swift has a beef with kanye west .
it seems the singer is unhappy with west 's `` misogynistic message '' in his new track , famous - which sees the rap star namecheck ms swift , followed by the lyrics : `` i made that b famous . ''
a statement from swift 's representatives denied west had sought permission from the star , contrary to earlier reports that she had given him her blessing .
kanye did not call for approval , but to ask taylor to release his single 'famous ' on her twitter account .
she declined and cautioned him about releasing a song with such a strong misogynistic message .

the track was debuted at a listening party for west 's new album , the life of pablo , at new york 's madison square garden - with the rapper also showcasing his latest fashion collection yeezy season 3 .
west was rounded on by swift 's friends and family , with her brother austin swift sharing a video of himself on instagram throwing away his yeezy shoes in response .
getting a head start on some spring cleaning .
here we go again .
read all about the album launch .

documents.title: new harry potter script tops charts
text: the script of the new harry potter play has topped the amazon and waterstones bestseller charts in the uk - months before it 's even published .
harry potter and the cursed child will be released on 31 july , the day after the play 's west end premiere , but pre-sale orders are already soaring .
the play will tell the `` untold part '' of the boy wizard 's story , including the story of the lives of his murdered parents , rowling has said .
it up the story 19 years after harry was last seen in harry potter and the deathly hallows , waving his two eldest children off to hogwarts .

documents.title: arg returns to the jump as injured christie drops out
text: james `` arg '' argent is returning to channel 4 's the jump in place of the injured linford christie .
the only way is essex star , who became the second contestant to be eliminated from the competition last week , posted his return on instagram with a video announcing : `` i 'm back , baby ! ''
`` proud to announce i will be returning to # thejump @ channel4 ca n't promise i 'll be good but that i will try my best !
# comebackking # prayforarg . ''
speaking about his decision to pull out of the competition early , linford christie said he was `` really disappointed '' .
i 'm really disappointed that the hamstring injury i up last week has meant that i must retire from the competition .
i have had lots of fun during my time in the jump and love the fact that i have discovered a new sport and look forward to skiing in the future .
christie is now the fifth celebrity to pull out of the reality tv show due to injury .
olympians beth tweddle and rebecca adlington , actress tina hobley and made in chelsea star mark-francis vandelli have all quit the show previously .

documents.title: get involved
text: we 're always happy to hear your views on the day 's news .
get in touch by tweeting @ bbcnewsents or emailing entertainment.news @ bbc.co.uk .
author: Lauren Turner
Entertainment Reporter

documents.title: barry manilow rushed to hospital
text: barry manilow has been rushed to hospital `` due to complications from emergency oral surgery '' that he had earlier in the week , according to a statement on his facebook page .
two us concerts , in highland heights and nashville , are being rescheduled as a result .
the statement said it 's not yet known if manilow will be able to attend the grammy awards on monday .
he 's nominated for his my dream duets album .
get well soon , barry !

documents.title: good morning
text: another day , another live page .

to kick off , we 'll be bringing you the berlin red carpet as the annual film festival enters its first full day , more news from the injury-hit set of the jump and reviews of matthew perry 's new west end play , the end of longing .
and after that who knows ?
another top gear presenter ? !
stick with us to find out .
author: Victoria Lindrea
BBC Entertainment and Arts reporter
